mission_structure.description: Campaign framed as series of single-session missions

paid_jobs.notes: Just a framing device, supply costs not tracked

items.other: Carry over between missions, lost if left behind

role_changes.description: Can choose new role between missions when natural closure reached
role_changes.narration: Encouraged to narrate how new role fits character

trait_customization.description: Players encouraged to narrate origin of new traits
examples: ILLUSION trait from sensory deprivation tank
ILLUSION trait from holographic projection drones

global_politics.referee_role: Maintain fictional world responding to player actions

consequences.example: Witnessing assassination of British politician likely leads to MI6 harassment
notes: FIST not well-liked by intelligence community
Unlikely to be hired directly by governments/corporations
Rogue ultrahuman actors seen as risk to status quo

anti_canon.description: No one correct FIST game world

book_content.status: Tools and seasonings, not hard truths

table_world.description: World created through roleplay is more real than book content
examples: 'This is worse than the Budapest job'
'You know, I helped JFK slay a vampire'
